resources.string: Toolbox Traditional Chinese Resource Pack For Minecraft PE
Added Traditional Chinese to your Toolbox mod\n\nPlease click the button below to install the Resource Pack, after finishing, start the Toolbox and apply it in the "Settings> Global Resource Pack".
Toolbox Traditional Chinese Resource Pack install is successful, please start Toolbox and apply the Resource Pack!
You do not have Toolbox installed. Please download it on Google Play!
Open Toolbox, go to "Settings> Global Resource Pack" to apply within Traditional Chinese Resource Pack Toolbox.
